resources.string: Fare for any E-Rickshaw ride in campus is Rs.10/person
Fare to book an E-Rickshaw completely is Rs.50/trip and maximum of 1 hour/trip
Maximum number of Passengers to be allowed on the E-rickshaw will be 4.
Helpline number for the passengers to file complaints when the driver displays inappropriate behaviour is +916901029704. The complainant will have to provide the driver details.
Action will be taken against inappropriate behaviour of drivers (like drunken driving, rude behaviour with passengers, refusal to go to a particular location, not complying with traffic rules).
Access to the location service is required to show your location on the map.

This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'IITG E-Rickshaw\'.
Location permission if you want to see your location.
Any feedback with fake ID or message won\'t be entertained.
